text: Plai may refer to several places in Romania: * Plai, a village in Avram Iancu Commune, Alba County * Plai, a village in Gârda de Sus Commune, Alba County * Plai, a village in Blăjeni Commune, Hunedoara County * Plai, a village in Breznița-Motru Commune, Mehedinți County * Plai, a village in Drajna Commune, Prahova County * Plai, a village in Fundu Moldovei Commune, Suceava County * Plai, a tributary of the Crișul Alb in Hunedoara County * Plai (Mureș), a tributary of the Mureș in Hunedoara County
title: Plai
